column5: I'm still in if somone wants to take over the Tournament.

Well, bassboy and I are going to be there no matter what, as long as someone can bring along something that we can use to safely weigh the fish then I think thats all we'll really need to worry about, its just for fun anyways...I just don't have anything...

I am organizing a (fun) Bass tournament on Rice Lake.  The tournament is open to all skill levels, but if you are coming just to be super competitive, please look at entering into another tournament.  For the tournament details and to register for the tournament, please go to www.stoty.com/tournament.  Please note: All teams MUST register beforehand. Also, when you are registering, please fill out the form completely. This means include an email address so I can contact you.  Thanks again for the interest, and lets have a good fun day.  *Stoty
After a few comments that have been brought to our attention....Live bait will NO LONGER be permitted in the tournament.

Hi, I have a question I posted on your other thread but never got a reply. Anyways i was wondering if you will allow 4 people per boat? I realy want to enter into this tournement but I can only go if i can get my girlfriend and her parents to go. They aren't into competitive fishing but i might be able to talk them into since they will most likely be on love sick lake.
PM sent.
Cool. Registered with Patrick G.
Update:  Only 10 spots remaining! Sign-up quickly to ensure you get in!
Only 2 rental boats remain as well.
sounds like a fun tourney but too bad im sick of rice and dont have much luck on that lake.. have fun to all that are heading out!

Just a note to everyone who is thinking about registering....  I will be away as of tonight until Sunday, so I will not be able to respond to any questions, or confirm your registration was recieved until then. My buddy and I are heading into the Interior of Algonquin for the first time! Should be good times!  Thanks again for all who have registered.  *Stoty
Before u leave!!!  Do u know if the rental boats will have livewells?
No, I don't think they do.
The 16 footers should have a well as seen on the site but you would have to ask when you call.
Update:  There are only a couple spots left! If you want in, make sure to fill out the registration form ASAP!  Thanks, *Stoty
Update:  Only 3 spots left!  Glad to see so many OFC'ers are coming! It will be nice to meet you all!  *Stoty
So, how was Algonquin?

Hi everyone,  An issue has come up, and I will no longer be able to plan the Bass Tournament that I was trying to organize. I am really sorry to have to cancel the event, but I will for sure try and plan one for early next season.  Thanks again for all of your interest,  *Jamie

Sorry to hear that Jamie hope all is well.  For anyone else still going september 20th and how has rented a boat we should still have a small tourny. but thats up to you guys that still want to go.  Myself i'm still willing since it's a day out fishing with friends
I am still willing, and I suspect my partner bassboy would be as well.  I've got the day booked in my calendar, so it aint changing for me!

Lets hear from the other teams that have already registered if they still want to fish.  IF we can get most of the teams to go then i'm willing to put up 10 bags of Gary Yamamoto Custom Baits as a price if that helps. Lets hear from the other teams

Dang this sux, we can still organize this if we all put our heads together we should stick to the 20 dollar fee "per team"once paid we put all the money aside and assign numbers to teams all we need to worry about is weigh in other than that i am willing to help bring things together with the help of others that if you all still wanna do this??!!

I'm sure you guys can put it together its not that hard heck just ask Stotty what his plans were and ask for the score sheets or team sheets then go from there its not that hard if I was in the area I would help out but I will be chasing musky here on LSC most likely good luck and have fun and dont forget to post pics. One other thing ya can also ask for each team to bring a prize if needed to be set into a couple bigger prizes for the winners and other fun groups you come up with. Just remember keep it simple and have fun.
Pat i'm willing to help out in any way and like MrEh said "ask Stotty what his plans were and ask for the score sheets or team sheets then go from there"
I was registered - I'm still interested.  Please PM me if there's anything that needs to be done.
Does anyone know if anybody has taken this on yet?  My partner registered so if there were emails I wouldn't have recieved them.  I have the list of emails so I can get it going if no one has.
I would like to fish this with my 14 yr old son, if it's a go let me know.
